page.title: 06SOUTH WINGFIELD _ SHOPPING
page.content:
There are six shops in our area and a souvenir shop at Wingfield Manor. These are a general store, sweet shop, haberdashery, Post Office, hairdresser and mill shop. There are also seven inns and pubs which have off_licences.
We surveyed 55 adults and found that 52 of these did the bulk of their shopping in supermarkets in Alfreton.Three others travelled further afield. Thirty_nine people shopped once per week and eight several times per week. The village shops were used to purchase forgotten or 'odd' items. Mobile shops also call selling fish & chips and greengroceries.
The village was once self_sufficient with many more shops such as a small supermarket and bakers.
